content.rendered: There’s a myth about fixing small dents by rapidly hitting the area with cold and hot air. We were skeptical but there seems to be some truth to it in this video.

content.rendered: No one knows why this truck was driving around on a highway in Saudi Arabia with it’s bed raised but this dash cam owner was smart enough to stay the hell back as he watched it approach a sign it would definitely hit!

title.rendered: Ohio State Trooper Saves Trucker’s Life

content.rendered:
This dash cam recorded an Ohio State Trooper responding to a call about a semi that had crashed. When the trooper arrives he notices the cab has been driven off the road and he immediately sprints to see how the driver is.

From there you can hear him talking to the driver, working to keep him alive with CPR as paramedics arrive.

title.rendered: Female Officer Tried to Drive an Impounded Bike and Fails Miserably

content.rendered:
This police woman thought she could help this tow company get this recently impounded bike up on the bed but man was she wrong!

It should have been obvious when she tried to crank the ignition like it was a car that she shouldn’t be on that machine but soon enough she topples over and it lays down.

title.rendered: Turning an Old Honda into a Wood Splitter

content.rendered: Using a Stickler, this guy has found a great second life for his 1992 Honda Civic! He shows you the mod he set in to get it working then he even gives a demo showing how simply the front left wheel can now split logs in no time!

title.rendered: Watch this Lamborghini Get Cut in Half

content.rendered:
You may cringe when you see this but you won’t be nearly as hurt as this guy’s wallet!

This Lamborghini Aventador retailed for around $404,000 dollars when this driver bought it. Now it’s worth much, much less.

He was driving in Brooklyn when someone tried to cut in front of him to make for their driveway. He winds up hitting the car and spinning into the wall around this neighbor’s house. Once the back end clips the wall it completely severs the engine and rear axle from the rest of the car. The wall itself cuts this poor Lambo in two. So sad.

title.rendered: Incredible Footage of Chemical Explosion

content.rendered: In Tianjin, China there was a massive explosion at a chemical plant that resulted in massive property damage, hundreds of burnt vehicles and several deaths. Details about what cause it are still coming out but we’ve found this incredibly close dash cam footage of the explosion itself.

excerpt.rendered: In Tianjin, China there was a massive explosion at a chemical plant that resulted in massive property damage, hundreds of burnt vehicles and several deaths. title.rendered: How Well Does an iPhone Work as Brake Pads?

content.rendered: Ever wondered just how well an iPhone might work as a brake pad? They’re roughly the same size and could likely fit well. Sure they don’t have the same composition as actual brake pads but if you had some left over phones to burn through (literally as it turns out) and a Porsche in need of new brakes than perhaps you might be crazy enough to try this!

content.rendered: The owner of this incredible FrankenJeep has put so much work into this custom job that it can do things that would make a Jeep Rubicon run home! It’s capable of adjusting its own ride height as well as the angles it can articulate on. It’s also got an incredible body roll function that owner designed that allows it to approach previously unheard of angles of terrain!

title.rendered: What it’s Like to Take a ’90 Nissan Skyline GTR to a Nissan Dealership for Repairs

content.rendered:
Doug DuMuro over at Japlonik was having a small issue with his treasured 1990 Nissan Skyline GTR. He picked up this import and has taken care of it in all the important import type of ways. However, he noticed that some small piece of plastic had come loose underneath the car and would need to be removed. If you were ever going to trust your Skyline GTR to a dealership service department then this would be the perfect time!

He schedules an appointment and takes it on and shows you right here what it’s like to walk into a Nissan dealership with the most iconic of Nissan cars ever assembled and how the employees react!

title.rendered: Apparently a Good Ride in a Viper is Better Than Sex

content.rendered: So they guys at That Racing Channel have cracked the code of the internet to figure out what gets the most attention. They know individually it’s pictures of cats, videos of fast cars and last, but not least, anything involving a beautiful woman with a low cut top. Take the cats out of the equation and then put some gorgeous women in some supercharged GTRs and Vipers and BOOM…internet gold!

title.rendered: Carnado Caught on Dashcam

content.rendered: Here’s some scary footage from an Italian highway that suffered a tornado during some heavy traffic. The dashcam catches everyone stopping their cars and trying to wait it out. Some truck canopies come flying off and car hoods fly up!

title.rendered: Don’t Ever Approach a Cop the Way This Guy Does

content.rendered:
The cop seen here is responding to a call about a guy who’s car is sitting in the median as the driver is apparently running around trying to stop other vehicles and yell at people.

As soon as the officer pulls up the guy gets out of his car (first mistake), starts yelling at the officer (second mistake) then aggressively approaches him (third and most idiotic mistake) then gets immediately tased and sent to the ground.

We realize a lot of police are under the microscope for being overly aggressive or brutish because some bad apples out there are making good cops look bad but there’s no excuse for this guy to be so woefully unaware that you can’t just approach a cop like that and not expect to get hit with a taser!

title.rendered: Steel or Military Grade Aluminium? How Does the New F-150 Stack Up?

content.rendered:
When Ford announced they were going to assemble the new F-150 truck out of military grade aluminium rather than the industry standard of steel it had a lot of people wondering what they were thinking.

If you’re one of the doubters than we suggest you check this video out! Here we’ve got the old Ford with steel and the new one with aluminium stacked next to each other while a number of objects strike the bed to gauge which can take more damage.

title.rendered: Brutal Motorbike Accident for Guy Martin

content.rendered: Guy Martin is an 11-times Ulster GP winner who suffered a horrible accident after losing control of his Tyco BMW at Ireland’s corner during the Co Antrim circuit. While he suffered breaks to his ribs and even a few vertebrae but he’s already recovering very well and has his family by his side!

title.rendered: Brutal Cyclist Crash into Car During Downhill Race

content.rendered: The Guardman’s Pass Tour of Utah took place this past summer. Someone captured footage of this particularly rough corner and a crash that took place there. One cyclist comes into a hairpin turn too hot and winds up T-Boning a car. It’s a rough crash!

excerpt.rendered: The Guardman’s Pass Tour of Utah took place this past summer. Someone captured footage of this particularly rough corner and a crash that took place there. One cyclist comes into a hairpin turn too hot and winds up T-Boning a car. It’s a rough crash!

_yoast_wpseo_opengraph-title: Brutal Cyclist Crash into Car During Downhill Race
_yoast_wpseo_opengraph-description: The Guardman's Pass Tour of Utah recently took place this past summer and someone captured footage of this particularly rough corner and a crash that took place there. A number of team cars are traveling with the cyclists but as they're all downshifting to proceed with the hill one cyclist doesn't cut their speed quickly enough before the curve and winds up T-Boning a car and crumpling into the pavement! It's a rough crash!

title.rendered: The Russian Shaman Might Be the Mightiest All Terrain Vehicle You’ve Ever Seen

content.rendered: The Shaman is a Russian built 8 Wheel Drive All-Terrain monster capable of tackling anything the outdoors can throw at it. Built by Avtoros, this 20 foot long, 10 feet tall and 8 feet wide behemoth might not look very agile but it’s surprisingly nimble. Just check out the video to see what we’re talking about!

title.rendered: This Poor, Doomed Mercedes Benz SLS AMG Dies an Awful Death

content.rendered: It’s pretty common to peek into a junkyard and find some typical rides getting demolished. No one hangs on to their Corolla for sentimental reasons. But a Mercedes SLS AMG? We don’t know why this poor Benz was sent to the chopping block but there’s something oddly satisfying about watching something so expensive get obliterated!

_yoast_wpseo_opengraph-description: It's pretty common to peek into a junkyard and find some typical rides getting demolished. No one hangs on to their Corolla for sentimental reasons. But a Mercedes SLS AMG? We don't know why this poor Benz was sent to the chopping block but there's something oddly satisfying about watching something so expensive get obliterated!

title.rendered: Crash Testing the New Aluminium Bodied Ford F-150

content.rendered: Just how safe is that new aluminum bodied F-150 going to be? If you’re curious at all we recommend checking out this video detailing how it reacts to every manner of impact that routinely occurs on the road. Given how you see the truck react to these impacts, do you feel like you’d trust aluminium?

title.rendered: Don’t You Hate it When Runners do This?

content.rendered:
Runners typically get sidewalks to hang out on. That’s the deal. They get their sidewalks and drivers get the road. However, as Matt from The Smoking Tire realizes they can dangerously show up in the worst places.

He’s reviewing the new BMW M4 modified with DINAN’s “S1” package when he comes across these idiots stretching in the open road!

category.name: Off Road
category.description: Trucks, Jeeps, Buggys, and events that happen off the tarmac or asphalt all gather here in our home for down and dirty off road goodness!

title.rendered: Corvette Z06 Loses a Wheel on the Nurburgring and Takes a Hard Crash

content.rendered: The Nurburgring seems to claim the lives of more cars than compactors and repo men combined! This particularly nasty footage came just recently as someone witnessed this doomed Corvette Z06 lose a wheel while trying to overtake that Opel. Once the wheel came off at 90 mph the ‘vette didn’t stand a chance. It wrecks horribly but the driver getting out in disbelief at the end is proof that he was alright.

title.rendered: Semi Leaps Off Road and Obliterates Self Across Highway

content.rendered: We doubt this particular jump was on the trucker’s normal route! It appears like it might have somehow missed an on ramp to the above overpass when it launches straight across two perpendicular lanes.
